name: Lenovo Legion 5 Intel Core i7
information: This Lenovo Legion 5 comes with a 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, and a 15.6-inch FHD display with a 144Hz refresh rate. Ideal for gaming and productivity.

name: Moto Edge 50 Fusion
information: Moto Edge 50 Fusion features a 6.7-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 778G processor, and a 5000mAh battery for long-lasting performance.

name: Realme Mustang
information: The Realme Mustang delivers an immersive sound experience with 40mm dynamic drivers, 70 hours of battery life, and fast charging support.

name: ASUS TUF Gaming-Ryzen 5
information: This ASUS TUF Gaming laptop is powered by a Ryzen 5 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX graphics, a 144Hz refresh rate display, and a durable military-grade build.

name: Google Pixel 8a
information: The Google Pixel 8a offers a 6.3-inch OLED display, Google's custom Tensor G2 chipset, an AI-powered camera, and 5G connectivity for a premium experience.

name: Realme Wireless Buds 3
information: Realme Wireless Buds 3 feature active noise cancellation, Bluetooth 5.2, a 40mm boost driver for powerful bass, and up to 29 hours of battery life.

name: Apple M1 Air
information: Apple MacBook Air with M1 chip delivers blazing-fast performance, a fanless design, Retina display, and all-day battery life, making it a perfect choice for productivity.

name: Moto Razr 50 Ultra
information: The Moto Razr 50 Ultra is a foldable smartphone with a 6.9-inch pOLED main display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, and a high-end dual-camera setup.

name: Skull Candy Hesh Evo
information: The Skull Candy Hesh Evo wireless headphones provide premium sound quality, active noise cancellation, and up to 36 hours of battery life with rapid charging support.
